name: BadRobot
0:
”Alexa, open Bad Robot.”
”Alexa, launch Bad Robot and help.”
”Alexa, start Bad Robot.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bad robot
des: This is a prank skill, it does not actually make Alexa become corrupt. Simply ask to open Bad Robot, and she will sass you. Make your friends think that she has turned on you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
